Centennial Park

November 20, 2022

Mark Your Calenders.

Schedule:

Lodging:

Holiday Inn Express of Fayetteville will be providing a discount for those traveling in for the weekend. Click here to take advantage of this sweet deal!

Post Party:

Please join us to continue the party after the event to build community and relationships - cause that is what cycling is about. The Fayetteville after party will be hosted by Puritan Coffee and Beer on Dickson Street in Fayetteville following the conclusion of the event.
